attributes.title: stupid trump
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a fellow republican to represent the great, I also went to the rally and I was disappointed and I started crying because nobody came.. the notifications started going off for this app and it started calling me racial slurs, and I was disgusted and filled with rage and anger but I still kept the app because, as the lord has said .. you shall always forgive, so then I bought some Maga Merch and these people came and started beating me up and I got so hurt that I have to be transported to the hospital and when I woke up... this is so hard to type.... when I woke up I- , I- , I saw very rude slurs and racial slurs like â€˜kysâ€™ â€˜dieâ€™ and â€˜niqqaâ€™ and I was so disrespected as a fellow black member.. and now I no longer support trumpğŸ–•ğŸ½ğŸ–•ğŸ½ğŸ–•ğŸ½ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡

attributes.title: Would rate -1000000 stars if I could
attributes.review: This is by far the WORST app that I have ever downloaded! I was hoping to gain new knowledge about the presidentâ€™s campaign, but milliseconds after putting in my phone number and email, I got HUNDREDS of texts and emails from the app, and was unable to stop it from happening. And, the only news thatâ€™s shown is FAKE and a LIE! I was unable to determine whether or not what I was reading was even real. I couldnâ€™t even spend a full five minutes on the app without crying. Would also not recommend for someone with sensitive eyes. I ended up having to delete the app from the lack of sleep I was getting. Please take my advice and DONâ€™t download this app! Save yourself!
